trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type=hidden>" name="<input type=hidden>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático a HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type=hidden>" name="<input type=hidden>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: You can use the HtmlInputHidden control to embed information that is hidden from the user within a `<form>` element.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o controlo de HtmlInputHidden para incorporar as informações que se encontre oculto do utilizador dentro de um `<form>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: This information is sent when the Web page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Estas informações são enviadas quando a página Web é publicada novamente para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputHidden control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de HtmlInputHidden fornece um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>evento que é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>propriedade altera os valores entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe criar um processador de eventos que executa um conjunto personalizado de instruções sempre que o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HtmlInputHidden control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > HtmlInputHidden o controlo não fornecer uma forma incorporada publicar novamente para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> control, to send the value of the control back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Tem de fornecer outro controlo na página Web que suporte a publicar para o servidor, tais como um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>controlo, para enviar o valor do controlo de volta para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ASP.NET page framework uses this HTML feature to automatically load and persist the view state of server controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Estrutura de página do ASP.NET utiliza esta funcionalidade HTML para carregar e manter o estado de visualização de controlos de servidor numa página automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputHidden, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de HtmlInputHidden, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The "hidden" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| A cadeia de literal "oculta". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Processa os dados de nova colocação para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks to see whether the postback value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control is different from the previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadPostData verifica se o valor de nova colocação o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controlo é diferente do valor anterior e, se assim for, devolve `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadPostData é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> estado do controlo é alterado como resultado a nova colocação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is called just prior to rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de OnPreRender é chamado antes da composição do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPreRender é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém dados de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to handle the event directly.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe processar o evento diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is changed on the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>evento é desencadeado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>propriedade é alterada no servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controlo tem de ter o estado de visualização ativado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>eventos funcione corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerChange method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnServerChange também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange*> method to signal the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange*>método para assinalar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> controlo que o estado do controlo é alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RaisePostDataChangedEvent é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo para expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> atributos do controlo especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém o fluxo de saída a compor no cliente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value*> property is changed on the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value*>propriedade é alterada no servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The ServerChange event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is changed between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O evento de ServerChange é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>propriedade é alterada entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the ServerChange event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controlo tem de ter o estado de visualização ativado para o evento de ServerChange funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData*> interface method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <> </> *> método de interface ao chamar o <> </> *> método.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> estado do controlo é alterado como resultado a nova colocação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> interface method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <> </> *> método de interface ao chamar o <> </> *> método.
